actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 31, 1979 (H. Doc. 96-46) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 31,1979 (H. Doc. 96-46) for the helium fund of the Bureau of Mines.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of January 31, 1979 (H. Doc. 96-46) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
